price: Dan mereka berkata, "Segala puji bagi Allah yang telah menghilangkan duka cita dari kami.  Sesungguhnya Tuhan kami benar-benar Maha Pengampum lagi Maha Mensyukuri.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَذۡهَبَ عَنَّا ٱلۡحَزَنَۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٞ شَكُورٌ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī adhhaba ʿannā al-ḥazana inna rabbanā laghafūrun shakūrun
